parameters.name: StyleFiles
parameters.description: Full pathname of file containing line styles to import

parameters.name: StyleNameList
parameters.description: Array of strings containing style names

parameters.name: ReplaceExisting
parameters.description: True to replace existing styles, false to not

title: IDrawingDoc.LoadLineStyles
description: Loads the specified line styles into the current drawing.
signature:
System.Boolean LoadLineStyles( 
   System.String
StyleFiles
,
   System.Object
StyleNameList
,
   System.Boolean
ReplaceExisting
)

parameters.name: StyleFiles
parameters.description: Full pathname of file containing line styles to import

parameters.name: StyleNameList
parameters.description: Array of strings containing style names

parameters.name: ReplaceExisting
parameters.description: True to replace existing styles, false to not

returns: True if successful, false if not
